title: Radisson Hotel Group accelerates growth in India with 21 signings in 2023
description: KB Kachru, Chairman Emeritus and Principal Advisor of Radisson Hotel Group, expressed confidence in the chain's strong growth trajectory for 2024. The company aims to expand its roots and fortify its presence in untapped markets in India.
